title: Castlevania.Lords.of.Shadow.Mirror.of.Fate.HD.Crackfix-RELOADED
description:
Castlevania: Lords of Shadow - Mirror of Fate HD *Crackfix* (c) Konami Digital Entertainment
   
       03/2014 :..... RELEASE.DATE .. PROTECTION .......: Steam
             1 :.......... DISC(S) .. GAME.TYPE ........: Action, Adventure
  
                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                    
                                                                           

 Note:
 -----
 When playing Alucard in Act II, the game went to black & white mode and every
 few seconds, screen went black, then back to black and white and so on... This
 new crack fixes the problem.

 -----


 This sequel to Castlevania: Lords of Shadow reveals the story of the Belmonts
 as they battle destiny across generations to discover their true fate. Trevor
 Belmont, knight of the Brotherhood of Light, embarks on an epic quest to
 avenge his mother who was killed by his father Gabriel. Gabriel, now known as
 Dracula has declared war on the Brotherhood, leading to a cataclysmic
 showdown between Father & Son! Explore Dracula's castle to discover hidden
 secrets, play with different characters, master 30 different combat moves,
 magic and secondary weapons. Once you've completed the adventure try
 surviving 'Boss Rush' mode - a fight to the death against all the game's
 bosses. Post your times online and compare against your friends. 


                                                                                                
                                                                                                                             
                                                                                           


 1. Unrar.
 2. Copy over the fixed cracked content to your game install directory.
 3. Play the game.
 4. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT!
